item.title: Ethical hacking Intro
item.description: Motes from ethical hacking introduction course ITI (maharahtech), you can find this course here, delivered in arabic. 1. Recon Search engines: archive : https://web.archive.org/ netcraft : sites pipl : people Google search and shodan: google searching dorks google hacking database www.exploit-db.com shodan.io Website Reconnaissance Tools: Web Data Extractor (GUI tool): extracting data from a website, http://www.webextractor.com/download.htm HTTrack (GUI tool) : mirroring a web site for offline browsing, https://www.
